Other Information.Additional Info: The MOF effectively encapsulated and protected siRNA from degradation.

Experimental Validation.Method: Western blot, ELISA, flow cytometry, immunohistochemistry
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Effective downregulation of DDR2 and ITGAV proteins, reduction in collagen I levels by 84.9%, increased CD8+ T cell infiltration (6.2-fold increase).

Other Information.Additional Info: The material demonstrated biocompatibility and safety in vivo with no significant alterations in blood parameters or organ histopathology.
